job_tasks.phrase: bridge the gap between IT Support and DevOps
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates a role focused on operational aspects, specifically linking IT support with DevOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be a DevOps Engineer with a focus on our employees and their IT service needs
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the role as a DevOps Engineer, emphasizing operational responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: working closely together with the DevOps Engineers to solve more complex support issues
job_tasks.justification: Highlights collaboration with DevOps engineers to resolve escalated issues, implying operational troubleshooting and support.

job_tasks.phrase: improve and automate the processes for the IT support team
job_tasks.justification: Automating processes for a support team can involve scripting and software development tasks to enhance efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: assist the more junior members of the team with classical IT support issues
job_tasks.justification: This task involves helping colleagues with support issues, which requires understanding the team's operational needs and workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain and administer various tools served by the IT Support team
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and administering tools falls under operational management and support.

soft_skills.phrase: working closely together with the DevOps Engineers
assist the more junior members of the team
Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.
Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication.
We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development
Monthly full-day hacking sessions: where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about
we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.

classification.rationale: The job description primarily focuses on IT operations, support, and traditional DevOps practices. There is no mention of Generative AI, LLMs, or related technologies, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. The tasks described align more with IT support and MLOps rather than AI model development or deployment.
